Broken Arm.name: Broken Arm
Broken Arm.description: Arm unusable. Drop what it was holding

Broken Ribs.name: Broken Ribs
Broken Ribs.description: Suffer crit damage at end of turn if you move more than 4m/yrds on foot.

Dismembered Arm.name: Dismembered Arm
Dismembered Arm.description: Arm removed, drop anything it was holding.

Dismembered Hand.name: Dismembered Hand
Dismembered Hand.description: Hand removed, drop anything it was holding.

Dismembered Leg.name: Dismembered Leg
Dismembered Leg.description: Leg is removed. Cannot Dodge. -6 MOVE (minimum MOVE of 1).

Foreign Object.name: Foreign Object
Foreign Object.description: Suffer Crit damage at end of turn if move more than 4m/yrds on foot.
